06f437e6028b623f0293e125433200b1594059dc.query:
SELECT
                    id,
                    user_id,
                    character,
                    stroke_count,
                    created_at,
                    updated_at,
                    version
                FROM
                    characters
                WHERE
                    user_id = $1
                    AND
                    ($2::VARCHAR(8)[] IS NULL OR character = Any($2))
                    AND
                    ($3::VARCHAR(64)[] IS NULL OR id = Any($3))
                    AND
                    ($4::VARCHAR(64) IS NULL OR id < $4)
                    AND
                    ($5::VARCHAR(64) IS NULL OR id > $5)
                ORDER BY
                    CASE WHEN $6 = 0 THEN id END DESC,
                    CASE WHEN $6 = 1 THEN id END ASC
                LIMIT $7

1105ff73775ea22350333bd0198157de3d3e6483.query:
UPDATE characters
                SET
                    updated_at = $1,
                    stroke_count = $2,
                    version = $3
                WHERE
                    id = $4
                    AND
                    user_id = $5
                    AND
                    version = $6

                            id,

5593af64b2397a5a9734b847a1388046efe880c7.query:
INSERT INTO characters (id, user_id, character, created_at, updated_at, stroke_count, version)
                VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5, $6, 1)

                    AND

b973d955661f9b03bd16a1f02e328c7c899c7a0d.query:
SELECT
                    r.id,
                    r.user_id,
                    r.character,
                    r.figure,
                    r.created_at,
                    r.stroke_count
                FROM
                    records AS r
                JOIN
                    characters AS c ON r.character = c.character AND r.user_id = c.user_id
                WHERE
                    r.user_id = $1
                    AND
                    ($2::VARCHAR(8)[] IS NULL OR r.character = Any($2))
                    AND
                    ($3::VARCHAR(64)[] IS NULL OR r.id = Any($3))
                    AND
                    ($4::VARCHAR(64) IS NULL OR r.id < $4)
                    AND
                    ($5::VARCHAR(64) IS NULL OR r.id > $5)
                    AND
                    r.stroke_count = c.stroke_count
                ORDER BY
                    CASE WHEN $6 = 0 THEN r.id END DESC,
                    CASE WHEN $6 = 1 THEN r.id END ASC
                LIMIT $7

d2ca950c76d88c1144c4dd4c2797da49a428d5c5.query:
INSERT INTO records (id, user_id, character, figure, created_at, stroke_count)
                VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5, $6)

f690c1db5b7ecd24ee76ad32e9d85dd85dc92434.query:
SELECT
                            id,
                            user_id,
                            character,
                            figure,
                            created_at,
                            stroke_count
                        FROM
                            records
                        WHERE
                            id = $1
                            AND user_id = $2
